issues_without_maintainer_response.title: Allow MCP servers to "resume state"
Make the MCP Protocol support MCP <-> MCP communication, allow AI to chain MCP execution flows
Message bus support
Response format schema for prompts
At the MCP Client side to selectivelly disable some of the tools from being listed
Tools filtering
one JSON-RPC Batch request with SSE stream
[Specification] Make tools inputSchema optional
Proposal: Leveraging Action Manifests for Better Agent Security
Improve JSON Schema explanation and add reference link in "Tool definition structure" section
Ambiguity in error handling documentation for tools
Unspecified error handling for tool calls with output schema
Define Specification for MCP like OpenAPI Specification (OAS) for RESTful APIs
Proposal: Add RootsTemplate to the schema
Define display name for prompt/tool/resource input
[SPEC] Clarification on Notification Identification and Naming Convention
Specification should be more prescriptive about client/host/LLM behavior
Enable structured inputs/outputs for Resources
[process] Dynamic switching of MCP servers
Feature Request: Tool Versioning Documentation
Versioning challenges with spec negotiation – client/server compatibility & rollout concerns
Listing tools filling up context window
Obligatory MCP state transitions
The authorization spec is unclear when multiple Authorization servers are involved
Consider not requiring the resource parameter for certain IDPs
SEP-1400: Semantic Versioning for MCP Specification
Bug(Schema): Linting issues found using the @sourcemeta/jsonschema cli
Sampling should support embedded resources
SEP-1456 – Support for Custom Input with Predefined Options in elicitInput API
SEP: Attested Client Registration and Proof-of-Possession
Elicitation security guidance may conflict with examples
Support for Custom Metadata in Tool Specification
SEP-1560: Addition of secretHint Tool Annotation
SEP-1573: Allow Non-File URI Schemes for Roots
SEP-1596: Configuration Schema for MCP Servers
SEP-1610: Declarative Multi‑Step Tool Chaining for MCP
MCP specification inconsistent naming format of methods
MCP doesn't sufficiently specify its integration with RFC 8414
Unclear if `ping` MUST be supported before `initialize` request
Publish the package `@modelcontextprotocol/specification`
Make RFC 9207 issuer validation (OAuth mixup attack prevention) mandatory
SEP-1766: Digest-Pinned Tool Versioning and Interceptor-Based Validation in MCP
[SEP-1792] Proposal: Add agencyHint tool annotation
SEP-1821: Dynamic Tool Discovery
Clarify and potentially rename “stdio” transport to reflect generic byte-stream support
Add `pending` or `submitted` status to TaskStatus
Define behavior when Last-Event-ID is unresumable (unknown / expired / wrong session)
Tasks SEP-1686 missing important operation "wait"/"await" to prevent excessive polling
Tasks SEP-1686：Define result when there are pending `tasks/result` and `tasks/cancel` is called
Elicitation client side timeout coodination
The roadmap, last updated 2025-10-31, is out of date
RFC: Memory Portability Tools for MCP Servers
MCP and Long-Running Tool Outputs for Telemetry Streams
Add server-side lifecycle state machine and gating rules to Lifecycle docs
